text:
Demi Lovato confirmed that her upcoming Tell Me You Love Me Tour will be giving fans access to free therapy at all of her shows. The singer stopped by Good Morning America to make the announcement, the concerts will include inspirational speeches and group therapy and wellness workshops by CAST Centers to promote dialogue about mental health.

Lovato, who has been open about her own mental health battles is co-owner of the Los Angles based wellness center.

“I want to do this because one, it was such an incredible experience the last time we did this on tour” said Lovato.

“It’s a part of my whole…life, about giving back and I think it’s really important that I continue to do this while I’m on tour.”
title: Demi Lovato’s 2018 Tour to Include Free Therapy for Fans
